question: 37. (427) Which one of these circuits requires the use of GFCI protection?
options: a. 120 V/20 A receptacles in bathrooms.

c. 240 V/50 A range circuit. d. 240 V/30 A dryer circuit.
correct: a. 120 V/20 A receptacles in bathrooms.
